# Construct Essence, Mass Lesser (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[Warforged (Domain)|Warforged 7]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]] 

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living construct/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Faiths of Eberron (WotC), pg. 150

*You spread your arms, and about you, your warforged comrades become more durable and unyielding.*

As *[[Construct Essence, Lesser (Spell)|lesser construct essence]]**,* except as noted above.
